Text: Thanks, looks like a really good movie!

Any idea how I can merge 2 files into 1? I need to do so as I need to watch this with subs & the subs I found are for 1 CD only. Unfortunately, mkv file doesn't play on my PC. Any help will be highly appreciated. Thanks.

You can play mkv with VLC player, it's free to download.

You can use AVI Joiner (google it) to join the avi's together, if you need to. But each part has a separate srt. file, so you can use VLC Player to load each subs with each file, if you like.
